channel.title: Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News
channel.description:
After running whonix check, I observed the following warning. Please let me know what went wrong. Thank you.
"ERROR: Whonix News Download Result: Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News whonix_news.tar.xz!!! (gpg exit code: 2 | validsig: false) This is either, - a Whonix Bug, - an attack on Whonix, - or Whonix News Keys might be outdated. Upgrading using apt-get might fix this. "
Edit by Patrick: Changed title.

item.title: Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Got a solution in the wings, but not implemented yet.
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T54

Read full topic
item.source: Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News

item.title: Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News
item.dc:creator: Nore
item.description:
Seeing this again today. It occurs each time I run whonixcheck.

Message reads:
ERROR: Whonix News Download Result:
Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News whonix_news.tar.xz!!!
(gpg exit code: 2 | validsig: false)
This is either,

  • a Whonix Bug,
  • an attack on Whonix,
  • or Whonix News Keys might be outdated. Upgrading using apt-get might fix this.

All apt-get packages are up to date, so I will check again tomorrow to see if issue is still happening.

Read full topic
item.source: Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News

item.title: Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Nothing too bad happening here. Apparently a sourceforge mirror is serving some pre-download page that asks if cookies are okay rather than the signature file. At first I could not reproduce it, because it does not happen for all sourceforge mirrors.

Read full topic
item.source: Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News
